column5: I bought corvalus 401 in BC and found that a left hand retrive is no good for me. Contacted Shimano Canada, and they VERY kindly offered to exchange the 401 for a 400, which is the right hand model. I was impressed by this to say the least. I have to cover shipping of my reel to them, however that is quite fair considering they are under no obligation to correct my purchase error. So I would like to publicly thank Shimano for doing this for me!
Good on them... I've never had a problem with Shimano products, and that is definitely great customer service. Glad to hear it!
Of all the companies Ive dealt with they have the best customer service bar none.
I have been using Shimano products since the late 70`s, mostly baitcasters and never needed customer service, they make a good product.
....Well that worked out well for you.
